func.name: chunk_name(Architecture) -> term()
func.fsummary: Returns the native code chunk name of the Architecture.

desc.p: Returns the native code chunk name of the Architecture. (On which presumably we are running.)

func.name: load_hipe_modules() -> ok
func.fsummary: Ensures HiPE's loader modules are loaded.

desc.p: Ensures HiPE's loader modules are loaded. Called from code.erl at start-up.

func.name: load_native_code(Mod::module_name(), Bin::binary()) -> {module, Mod} | no_native
func.fsummary: Loads the native code of a module Mod.

desc.p: Loads the native code of a module Mod. Returns {module,Mod} on success (for compatibility with code:load_file/1) and the atom no_native on failure.
